/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and white facades reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Trees line the street, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
